content.html: why have y'all not blocked that "lead dev" guy yet truly he is awful, RTing him feeds him, there is no need to bother, and further I do not appreciate screenshots of misogyny on my feed + having men feel compelled to respond to it just makes it worse
content.value:
why have y'all not blocked that "lead dev" guy yet

truly he is awful, RTing him feeds him, there is no need to bother, and further I do not appreciate screenshots of misogyny on my feed

+ having men feel compelled to respond to it just makes it worse
